value:
The fact that this kingdom bears the
name of Lord Askr is a sign of love
and respect I find deeply moving.

Where I come from, Lord Askr's
domain, there are many openings—
gateways, that is—to other worlds.

It seems no matter the meal, I always
end up feeling sluggish once I finish
eating. It can be...troublesome.

I commend your diligence with regard
to maintaining the happiness and
health of all. May you never falter.

For one such as myself to be able to
be in the presence of a mortal like
this is, well—to be honest—a joy.

Sincere apologies for the disruption...
My name is Ash. I am grateful for the
opportunity to appear before you.

Yes, I believe that is a satisfactory
result given my ability. I am, of course,
biased in that regard, you understand.

Would you object to the idea that this
result is the sort you ought to expect
from someone like me?

I regret to report that I have failed to
meet my own expectations for myself.
I offer you my most sincere apologies.

How can I thank you enough for such
generosity? This gesture demands an
immediate display of my gratitude.

I am Ash, retainer to Askr, the Divine
Dragon for whom this land is named.
I offer my service, if you will have it.

I exist to serve a specific purpose.
In that way, my existence differs from
that experienced by you mortals.$k$pHopes, desires, dreams, and other
such things that fill the lives of
mortalkind...I do not experience.$k$pI can, however, feel the happiness of
mortals almost as if it were my own.$k$pAnd because of that, if I were to have
a dream, it would likely involve the
happiness of mortals, I believe.$k$pToward that end, my plan is to use
the full extent of whatever power
I can muster to further your cause.
それ！
やあっ！
きゃああっ！
いけません…
Consider it done!
Do try to understand.
Please forgive me.
For Lord Askr!
Such...disgrace...
Hmmm...
We are...not exactly what you might call family, perhaps—but it would not be accurate to say my relationship to Lord Askr is entirely unlike familial kinship.
*startle* Do you consider such interaction a form of greeting?
Please allow me to express my most sincere appreciation to everyone for making me feel so welcome here since I have arrived only a short time ago; it feels almost as if we have already been...
My deepest wish is for everyone to both discover and obtain that which will make them happy in this life, holding onto it as long as they might wish; such a thing would be a true blessing...
Regarding the matter you've raised, I can offer no satisfactory answer to that particular inquiry at this time—however, I will research the topic and report back with any findings...
This is the first occasion I have had in which I have been able to interact with any being quite like you... I must say, I have learned much thus far.
Please remember that I am ever at your service. Providing my assistance to those who have gathered here is truly my pleasure.
Truly?
Lord Askr guide us...
I do not object.
